chapterId: The id of the chapter (unique for each chapter
description: The description of the situation of the chapter

choices.abstract: A quick description of the choice the player is taking
choices.details: A more detailed description of the choice that is displayed when the player wants to know more

correspondingCaseFileIds: The identifiers of the case files that might be useful for this chapter
